links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,200
prog: (PARI) for(n=0,22,print(floor(Pi^n*exp(1)^n)))(PARI) { default(realprecision, 200); PiE=Pi*exp(1); for (n=0, 200, write("b062541.txt", n, " ", PiE^n\1) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 08 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 25 2001
